name: Galerie Lara Vincy
profile: Created in 1955 by Mrs Lara Vincy, the gallery, directed by Liliane Vincy since 1970, has developed its own adventure beyond fashion and main streams. Living art as a creative adventure always renewed has been its major line. From the 70’s, the Lara Vincy gallery has been exploring new art experiments : media installations, videos, sound environments, sociological actions…
